settings.heading: Claim your UTR profile
settings.description: See how you compare to the world’s best as well as to your friends and neighbors. As a player, your UTR profile is ready to claim. Start your journey and step into the Universal Tennis global community.

settings.heading: Where do you fit?
settings.subtitle: The UTR Rating is the world’s most accurate tennis rating system. All players regardless of age, gender, geography or skill level, are rated on the same scale from 1 and 16.50 based on daily match results. Claim your UTR Profile today.

settings.heading: how the utr rating Works
settings.description: The UTR Rating is the world’s most accurate tennis rating system that promotes fair and competitive play across the tennis world. All players regardless of age or gender are rated on the same scale from 1.00 to 16.50 based on actual dynamic match results.
The UTR Rating is the best way to measure yourself against all other players regardless of their age or level.
settings.author: Novak Djokovic

settings.description: Universal Tennis provides a standard for all players... the bigger the network gets, the more beneficial.

settings.description: We talk about it in the house all the time. My 16-year-old is using his UTR Rating as a motivator for improvement.
